meaningMnemonic: You walk up to a <radical>tree</radical> and put <radical>dynamite</radical> on it. Then you set it off. BOOM. It explodes, but doesn't do what you'd expect. Instead of blowing the tree up, it blasts a very beautiful <kanji>pattern</kanji> into the side of it as well as the ground around it.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>pattern</kanji> is so beautiful that you want to put it on your <reading>gara</reading>ge (がら). So, you do.
